main event: A round object, the size of a dime, was observed moving up and down 3 times before fading out, with no sound produced.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on 6 November 1957,Nearby Dallas, Texas.,The object was visible for only one minute.,Witnesses provided ground visual observations.,The object dimmed and could have been moving away.
sighted object: round object the size of a dime
witness description: Mrs. Fox, Cedar Hill, Texas, identified as H.Gus' wife.
